desc: Now that you’ve bought that amazing new DSLR, you need a book that goes beyond the camera manual to teach you how to take those great shots. One key element is composition—the creative arrangement of components in the shot, and the way a viewer’s eye travels through an image.

details.authors: Laurie Excell, John Batdorff, David Brommer, Rick Rickman, Steve Simon

title: Composition: From Snapshots to Great Shots
